frameDefinitions: An Exporter moves Goods across a border from an Exporting_area to an Importing_area.
An Importer receives Goods from an Exporting_area, across a boundary or border to a different area, the Importing_area.
A Sender plans the Path (along with Source and Goal) of a Theme and places it in circumstances such that it travels along this Path under the power of some entity other than the Sender.
In this frame a Part is part of a larger Whole comprised of parts that are ordered.

A Researcher (an individual a group or institution) attempts to answer a Question by means of consulting literature,  observation, or conducting experiments in a particular Field pertinent to the Question.
A Self_mover leaves an initial Source location.
frameExamples: Several companies actually make most of their income by <t>exporting</t> goods out of the country.
The U.S. <t>imported</t> some wheat in the period, although it exported about ten times as much.
I <t>sent</t> the manuscript to England to Bill.
I sat through the first interminable <t><fex name='Part'>act</fex></t>  of the play  .
Simmons and Nadel did <t>research</t> pertaining to Ardea purpurea and Egretta garzetta in 1998
listRoleDefinitions:
The conscious entity, generally a person, that moves the <fen>Goods</fen> across a border out of the <fen>Exporting_area</fen>.  

Very often, an <fen>Exporting_area</fen> will metonymically stand in for the person or persons directly responsible for the movement of the <fen>Goods</fen>.  In such cases the constituent should be labeled <fen>Exporter</fen> on the first layer and with the appropriate locational role on the second layer.
The items of value whose location is changing.
The role <fen>Importing_area</fen> is the place that the <fen>Goods</fen> end up as a result of motion.
The place where the <fen>Goods</fen> are initially, before the the <fen>Exporter</fen> moves them.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Exporter</fen> moves the <fen>Goods</fen>.
The conscious entity, generally a person, that brings the <fen>Goods</fen> into the <fen>Importing_area</fen>.
The items of value whose location is changing.
The role <fen>Importing_area</fen> is the place that the <fen>Goods</fen> end up as a result of motion.
The place where the <fen>Goods</fen> are initially, before the being moved.
This role identifies the time when the <fen>Importer</fen> moves the <fen>Goods</fen>.
This is the person who initiates the movement of the <fen>Theme</fen> and, unlike Carrying, does not accompany it.

The end of the path and intended goal of the sending.
I <t>sent</t> the logs <fex name='Goal'>to the shed</fex>.

The objects being sent.
I mailed <fex name='Theme'>the books</fex> <fex name='Goal'>to Alaska</fex>.
Note that <fen>Theme</fen> may be multiply instantiated.
They <t>mailed</t><fex name='Theme'>a questionnaire</fex> <fex name='Theme'>with a return envelope</fex>.

The mode of sending employed.
I <t>shipped</t> <fex name='Theme'>the crops</fex> <fex name='Transport_means'>by bigrig </fex>.

This is the recipient of the sent <fen>Theme</fen>.
<fex name='Sender'>Tess</fex> <t>mailed</t> <fex name='Theme'>a letter</fex> <fex name='Recipient'> to Abby</fex>
When the sending takes place
A spatial setting encomnpassing the Source location, where the Sending event takes place.
This is the number of the sequence of <fen>Part</fen>s.
A part of a larger <fen>Whole</fen>.
An undivided entity having all its <fen>Part</fen>s.
The people engaged in a research endeavor.
An area of inquiry.
A significant unanswered open proposition which the <fen>Researcher</fen> is attempting to resolve.
A phenomenon or idea involved in a <fen>Question</fen>.
The time when  the research is carried out.
The physical place where the research is carried out.
This is the entity which moves under its own power.

Any expression which implies a definite starting-point of motion expresses the frame element <fen>Source</fen>. In prepositional phrases, the prepositional object expresses the starting point of motion. In particles, the starting point of motion is understood from context.
The time at which the motion takes place.
The <fen>Place</fen> is where the motion (which is specified by a <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen>) is located.
listRoleExamples: <fex>The U.S.</fex> exports most of its peanut products.
I sent the letter to you <fex>last week</fex>.
Barney posted the letter on Monday <fex>in Athens</fex>
I sat through the <fex>first</fex> interminable <fex>act</fex> of the play .
I sat through the first interminable <fex>act</fex> of the play .
I sat through the first interminable <fex>act</fex> <fex>of the play</fex> .
Before he became an astronaut, <fex>Grunsfeld</fex> did research in physics.
When we have researched <fex>why Brazilian mothers have stopped breastfeeding</fex>, principal reasons given are 'poor milk' and 'insufficient milk' .
Would you take part in research <fex>on the best place to have a baby</fex>?

<fex>During summer of 1999</fex>, I did research using a technique called 'Path Integral Monte
Carlo', to simulate quantum particles.
Johnson and Randall's research <fex>in Africa</fex> has proven extremely valuable.
